name: Science Against the Dead
description:
The end of the 18th century will be marked in Europe as a period of questioning and discussions about the habit of burial in religious temples, seeking to implement measures that favor public health.
Thus causing the closure of a central cemetery “cemetery of the innocents”. 

“The cemetery, which for centuries represented a recreational and meeting atrium, where shops operated in front of the ossuaries, prostitutes strolled through the cloisters, processions and even parties were held, had its quality as a place of sociability between the living and the dead ended. ” Huizinga (1995),

This shows how hygienist ideals distanced us more and more from the figure of the dead, leading to beliefs that we carry to this day.

Abandoned tomb found in San Francisco Municipal Cemetery/ Curitiba/BR

photogrammetry scan - Higor Casagrande/2022
